import { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Spinner from "../../asset/spinner/spinner.component"; import { GithubContext } from "../../context/github/githubContext"; const User = () => { const { user, getSingleUser, isLoading } = useContext(GithubContext); const params = useParams(); useEffect(() => { getSingleUser(params.login); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); if (!isLoading) { return (
Back To Search
{/* Profile image */}

{user.name}

{user.login}

{/* Profile Details */}

{user.name}

{user.type}

{user.bio}

Location

{user.location}

Website

{user.blog}

Twitter

{user.twitter_username}
{/* Followers, following etc */}

Followers

{user.followers}

Following

{user.following}

Public Repos

{user.public_repos}

Twitter

{user.twitter_username}
); } else { return ; } }; export default User;
